Preference.app:title: How to change volume now when volume keys are doing something else?
Preference.app:summary: When media is playing, volume keys changes volume as usual. Otherwise, 5 volume quick volume clicks changes volume, as well as a long-press.

Preference.app:title: Will this app drain my battery?
Preference.app:summary: Normally a device falls asleep if you leave it alone for a while, and when the display is turned on it wakes up again. A sleeping device won't care about volume clicks, therefore this app prevents sleep. This means some additional battery drain, mainly when you leave it for a long time, like over night. Therefore, if you find this troublesome you might wanna disable it over night. In a future release I might improve this, perhaps prevent sleep according to time of day.

Preference.app:title: Can I remove the "Monitoring volume key presses" notification?
I need an action that isn't available, what to do?
Preference.app:summary: Try using the tasker-action (bottom of the list), Tasker can do lot's of stuff. Or, send me an email, perhaps I can implement it.
